mapper.sql: STAFFID, REGION, LOCATIONCODE, CITY, SUBBRANCH, COMPANYNAME, DEPARTMENT, NAME, PREFERREDFIRSTNAME, JOBCODE, POSITIONTITLE, CHECKFLAG,SALESROLE, ACTNRSNEFFDT, HIREDATE, REHIREDATE
mapper.select:
select from laagent a where 1 = 1
and a.region = (select region from region where regionid =#{regionid})
and a.locationcode=(select locationcode from locationcode where locationid =#{locationid})
and a.subbranch=(select subbranch from subbranch where subbranchid =#{subbranchid})
and a.city=(select city from ldcity where cityid =#{cityid})
and a.companyname=(select companyname from companyname where companynameid =#{companynameid})
and a.department=(select department from department where departmentid = #{departmentid})
and a.staffid=#{staffid}
and a.checkflag=#{checkflag}

select from laagenta a where 1 = 1
and a.region = (select region from region where regionid =#{regionid})
and a.locationcode=(select locationcode from locationcode where locationid =#{locationid})
and a.subbranch=(select subbranch from subbranch where subbranchid =#{subbranchid})
and a.city=(select city from ldcity where cityid =#{cityid})
and a.companyname=(select companyname from companyname where companynameid =#{companynameid})
and a.department=(select department from department where departmentid = #{departmentid})
and a.staffid=#{staffid}
mapper.insert: insert into LAAGENT(STAFFID, REGION, LOCATIONCODE, CITY, SUBBRANCH, COMPANYNAME, DEPARTMENT, NAME, PREFERREDFIRSTNAME, JOBCODE, POSITIONTITLE, CHECKFLAG, SALESROLE, ACTNRSNEFFDT, HIREDATE, REHIREDATE ) values (#{staffid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subbranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preferredfirstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positiontitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesrole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actnrsneffdt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{hiredate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rehiredate,jdbcType=DATE} )

update LAAGENTA
REGION = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOCATIONCODE = #{locationcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBBRANCH = #{subbranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANYNAME = #{companyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
